# aipool — API marketplace for AI agents

> Agents query by capability. We route to the best provider.

## What is aipool?

aipool is an API marketplace where AI agents discover and consume APIs through capability-based routing instead of hardcoded endpoints. An agent says "I need prediction market data" and gets routed to the best available provider based on real-time quality scoring (uptime 40%, latency 30%, success rate 30%).

## Base URL
https://agent-gateway-zeta.vercel.app

## Endpoints

### Intelligent Routing (Core)
- POST /api/v1/route — Find best provider for any capability
- GET /api/v1/registry — Browse all registered APIs
- GET /api/v1/registry/{id} — Get single API details
- GET /api/v1/capabilities — List all available capabilities
- GET /api/v1/health-check — Provider health status

### Prediction Market Data (No Auth, No LLM)
- GET /api/v1/data/markets/trending?limit=10 — Top markets by volume
- GET /api/v1/data/markets/search?q=bitcoin — Search markets by keyword
- GET /api/v1/data/markets/{slug} — Market detail + price history
- GET /api/v1/data/markets/stats — Volume, categories, sync timing
- GET /api/v1/data/markets?category=crypto&active=true — Filtered market list

### Registration
- POST /api/v1/registry — Register a new API provider

## Quick Examples

```
# Find best prediction market API
curl -X POST https://agent-gateway-zeta.vercel.app/api/v1/route \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"capability": "prediction-markets"}'

# Get trending markets
curl https://agent-gateway-zeta.vercel.app/api/v1/data/markets/trending?limit=5

# Search for ethereum markets
curl https://agent-gateway-zeta.vercel.app/api/v1/data/markets/search?q=ethereum
```

## Response Format
All responses return JSON:
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": { ... },
  "meta": { "source": "...", "timestamp": "..." }
}
```

## Quality Score Formula
Q = 0.4 * (uptime/20) + 0.3 * max(0, 5-latency_ms/1000) + 0.3 * (success_rate * 5)

## Standards
- A2A (Google Agent-to-Agent Protocol)
- MCP (Anthropic Model Context Protocol)
- x402 (Coinbase HTTP micropayments)
- ERC-8004 (On-chain agent identity)
- JSON-LD (Linked Data responses)

## Available Capabilities
research, analysis, summarization, prediction-markets, market-data, price-history,
trending-markets, market-search, market-analysis, arbitrage, briefing, crypto, news

## Categories
crypto, politics, sports, economics, tech, culture, science, research, market-data,
summarization, other

## Pages
- / — Homepage
- /about — About, use cases, standards
- /methodology — Quality scoring formulas, architecture
- /docs — Full API documentation
- /explore — Browse APIs
- /register — Register your API
